definition: large in amount or extent or degree
details:
adjective
- large in amount or extent or degree
= synonyms: goodly
- having or indicating good health in body or mind
- exercising or showing good judgment
= example: exercising or showing good judgment
= synonyms: sound
- financially secure and functioning well
= example: financially secure and functioning well
- promoting health
= synonyms: salubrious, good for you
